summary: MY WIFE WAS DRIVING ABOUT 70 MPH, HER JUKE STARTED LOSING POWER & SERVICE ENGINE LIGHT SOON CAME ON. SHE TOOK IT TO DEALERSHIP THEY TOLD HER IT WOULD BE COVERED UNDER WARRANTY. THEY NEXT DAY OR SO SAID THEY WERE NOT GOING TO COVER UNDER HER GOLD EXTENDED WARRANTY. THE TECH THAT INSTALLED A NEW TURBO FROM FACTORY SAID IT WAS DEFECTIVE. THEY ARE REFUSING TO COVER UNDER THE WARRANTY
